interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel | Blush
Review Date: 2022/09/27
Store: L'ANGE HAIR
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '10.1 x 3.1 x 3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2459', 'UPC': '810108191315'}
Review Text: I love Ľange products! This argan infused round brush is amazing when blowdrying damp hair to create lift and smooth out frizz. The heat transfers through the brush very well and dries hair quickly into desired style. Brush is built very well and good quality.
Review Title: Great for styling and adding lift to roots!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
MRTREUP 5Pcs Hair Brushes for Women, Hair Comb for Women and Detangling Paddle Brush with Mist Spray Bottle for Wet or Dry Hair, Rail Tail Comb Set for Straight Long Thick Curly Natural Hair
MRTREUP
{'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Color': '5 Pack Muti-purpose Hair Brush Set', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheenDetangle，Eliminate the pain and pulling, Anti-Frizz, Anti-Breakage, Section, Curl Enhancing, Scalp Stimulation, Shine Enhancing, Moisturize, shape, sheen   See more', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 4.92 x 2.56 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MRTREUP'}
Nice set of brushes and combs. And the spray bottle is nice but to my surprise as I squeezed the trigger it already had some sort of liquid in it. I'm not sure if that's from the company testing it or what. But to me that is strange when you receive a new product. However, the spray bottle does work well.
Spray bottle already had liquid in it.
YouClean 300 Antibacterial Travel Hand Soap Sheets - Pocket/Purse/Wallet/Backpack -Great for Outdoor Camping or Daily Use (Tea Party) (Tea Party)
YouClean
['Brand:', 'YouClean', 'Item Form:', 'Sheet', 'Formulation:', 'Concentrated plant-based soap', 'Scent:', 'Tea Party (Chamomile, Green Tea, Tea Tree)', 'Package Box Size:', '2 x 1 x 1.5 inch', 'www.shopyouclean.com', "We are changing our packaging. No more small plastic cases!   Our new packaging is 100% biodegradable paper. All 300 sheets are tightly packed in 3 tiny paper boxes (100 sheets/box) which nicely fit in any purse/wallet, handbag, and kids' pack-backs.   Check out our 9 scent collections:   - Tea Party  - Citrus Collection  - Purple Heart  - Pink Pamper  - Red Passion  - Blanca Elegance  - Seaside Vacation  - The Adventure  - The Nonsense (unscented)"]
{'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'YouClean', 'Scent': 'Tea Party', 'Material Type Free': 'Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)Plastic Free, Chemical Free (Not containing Sulfate, Phosphate, Paraffin, Phthalate, Gluten, Lead, Palm Oil and Mineral Oil)  See more', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 1 x 1.25 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '609670421100', 'Manufacturer': 'YouClean'}
These were so fun to wash hands with. The first few went down the sink. My kid had to learn to wet the opposite hand you held the soap in. It suds up really well and smells great! Taking these to the beach for the showers. Love!
So fun to use!
L’ange Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 43MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Color': 'Rose Gold, Black', 'Shape': 'Round', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.51 x 2.64 x 2.56 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '810108191223'}
This brush is another amazing product from Ľange. Very sturdy bristles and handle feels great in hand. Easy to create lift and style to hair.
Great round brush!
GAQQI DIY Lash Extension Kit, 32 PCS Wide-Stem Cluster Lashes with Super Hold Bond and Seal Glue, Applicator, 12+14mm Mixed Length Individual Lashes, DIY Eyelash Extension Kit at Home - Style Natural
GAQQI
{'Brand': 'GAQQI', 'Material': 'Faux Mink', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Item Form': 'Individual', 'Mounting Type': 'Tweezers', 'Package Dimensions': '6.77 x 4.25 x 0.83 inches; 2.89 Ounces'}
This is a great kit to do your own eyelashes. They eyelashes are clusters and are wispy and natural looking. Easy to apply. My lashes can look better and fuller all at home!
Great kit for eyelash extensions
L'ANGE HAIR Rubber Sectioning Hair Clips | Narrow-Tipped Design | For Parting & Sectioning Hair | Easy Grip Handles | Professional Styling Results | 6-Pack (Blush)
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Embellishment': 'Bow', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.71 x 1.14 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2323', 'UPC': '810108190585', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
These clips work great for sectioning hair for highlights. I also use them to hold hair above each slice I weave to keep hair nice and clean while applying bleach. These work really well!
Great clips
L'ANGE HAIR Detangling Comb Brush | Lightweight, Comfortable, Non-slip Design | Easy Glide, Smooth, Snag-Free Comb | Blush
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Color': 'Blush', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '11.1 x 3.5 x 0.51 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2335', 'UPC': '810108190264', 'Manufacturer': "L'ANGE HAIR"}
Another great product from Ľange! This pink comb is so cute and works good at getting those wet tangles loose. Very sturdy and good quality. Love this!
Cute pink comb!

Beauty Bakerie

{'Brand': 'Beauty Bakerie', 'Color': 'Berried', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Metallic', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.59 x 3.54 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Item model number': '754680458186', 'UPC': '754680458186', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bakerie Cosmetics Brand'}
Beautiful color! Goes on smooth and doesn't cake up. Feels great on. Love the packaging too! Good quality product.
Beautiful lip color
Arisson Men hs Razors Set – ludes 1 Ergonomic Design Razor Handle, 4 Blade Refills, Travel Blade Cover, Shave Gel (Black) 60 Count (Pack of 3)
Arisson
{'Brand': 'Arisson', 'Number of Blades': '5', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Handle Material': 'Rubber'}
I got this for my husband but I use it too. It gets a really close shave and blades are very sharp. I love this set! Great for a gift or just using it yourself.
Great for men or women!
L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel
L'ANGE HAIR
{'Brand': "L'ANGE HAIR", 'Shape': 'Round', 'Handle Material': 'Ceramic', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Package Dimensions': '12.32 x 4.76 x 3.58 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2456', 'UPC': '810108191339'}
If you're not hooked yet on Ľange, you don't know what you're missing. I am in love with every product I have bought from them. The curved flex brush is my favorite! This round brush is amazing. I can get such high lift and style with this tool. It has perfect flow for blowdryer heat. Use on slightly damp hair and it works amazing. Love the quality feel in the brush. Built to last.
Fantastic round brush!
L'ANGE HAIR Argan-Infused Round Brush | Lightweight & Ergonomic Design | 53MM Tourmaline Ceramic Barrel | Blush

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user actively expands their collection of grooming and beauty tools, emphasizing multifunctional, high-quality, and aesthetically pleasing items. Their recent acquisition highlights a continued appreciation for tools that enhance styling efficiency while aligning with their design sensibilities.

- **Experience Sensitivity:** They remain dedicated to eco-friendly products that prioritize functionality and comfort. This commitment spans across hair care and grooming, reflecting a holistic approach to personal care that balances usability, quality, and environmental impact.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user consistently leaves favorable reviews, showcasing their satisfaction with effective performance and durability. Their latest feedback particularly emphasizes their excitement about tools that excel in styling capabilities and overall quality.

- **Functional Needs:** They seek products designed for various hair and skin types, focusing on user-friendly tools that simplify their grooming routines and enhance results.

- **Purchase Context:** Recent acquisitions underline their intention to elevate grooming habits while maintaining health and hygiene standards, contributing to a comprehensive beauty regimen.

- **Consumer Attitude:** With a discerning and optimistic outlook, the user exhibits a strong preference for high-quality, functional tools that merge enjoyment with performance. Their commitment to sustainability spans both grooming and beauty categories, and they demonstrate a clear trust in reputable brands known for quality craftsmanship.
